# Problem 1


```{r}
rnormMatrix <- function(r, c) {
    return(matrix(rnorm(r*c), r))
}
```

# Problem 2

```{r}
colSums.builtin  <- function(x) {
    return(colSums(x))
}
```

# Problem 3

```{r}
colSums.apply <- function(x) {
    return(apply(x, 2, sum))
}
```

# Problem 4

```{r}
colSums.for <- function(x) {
    s <- vector("numeric", ncol(x))
    for (col in 1:ncol(x)) {
        s[col] = sum(x[,col])
    }
    return(s)
}
```

# Problem 5

```{r}
d = rnormMatrix(3, 4)
colSums.builtin(d)
colSums.apply(d)
colSums.for(d)

system.time(colSums.builtin(d))
```
